Articles.Content:
Well it seems that my Byet hosting account was hacked and the hacker registered a domain...

Even if the account was hacked do you have to pay for the domain?

I just sent in a ticket hoping for a reply...

The hacker was stupid enough to use his own address, though...

Well it seems that my Byet hosting account was hacked and the hacker registered a domain...

Even if the account was hacked do you have to pay for the domain?

I just sent in a ticket hoping for a reply...

The hacker was stupid enough to use his own address, though...

Are you sure?

It could have been a spoofed adress that he left...

Are you sure?

It could have been a spoofed adress that he left...

And you are right... I just google mapped the address and it gave me some store...

Ah well It\'s still not my address...
